person.persName: Elijah Adams Coppage (Marion County, Kentucky, farmer, merchant, second lieutenant (U.S.A.) and postmaster)

body.p:
Marion County, Kentucky, farmer, merchant, soldier, and postmaster. Kentucky native. Son of Joel Coppage and Lucinda Coppage. Married to Elizabeth Knott Coppage. Father of Emma Coppage. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Marion County in 1860.
Served as second lieutenant in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) in from September 8, 1862 to November 18, 1862. United States postmaster in Marion County from December 24, 1862 to November 23, 1864. United States postmaster in Marion County in 1865.
